citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 a.m.-
12:15 p.m. on 11/09/2015. Spoke with the owner's daughter who indicated no one would be available to
accompany inspector for the inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Kingston Susan, Supervisory Compliance Specialist
